trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGDRA2TAILFEATHER_00283_COLINA_000_000<tab>Oh, are you a traveler? Let me be one of the first to welcome you to Tailfeather!

TEXT_REGDRA2TAILFEATHER_00283_COLINA_000_010<tab>What's it look like? I'm learnin' the huntin' trade, just like my folks! Now, I haven't actually <var 1A 02 /var>hunted<var 1A 01 /var> yet, but I've got my hands full just helpin' out 'round the camp.

TEXT_REGDRA2TAILFEATHER_00283_COLINA_000_011<tab>Gettin' huntin' supplies, takin' care of the birds... Why, even now I'm lookin' over this fresh-caught chocobo. The other hunters say I ain't too bad with a bow, either!

TEXT_REGDRA2TAILFEATHER_00283_COLINA_000_020<tab>Hunters from all 'round make this encampment their base. Some are here hopin' to make a fortune, others are here 'cause they got nothin' better to do. You meet all sorts in this camp─there ain't never a dull moment!

TEXT_REGDRA2TAILFEATHER_00283_COLINA_000_021<tab>This forest is just teemin' with wild chocobos, and if you catch yourself a big one, merchants from Ishgard will pay buckets of gil for it! It's that thrill that keeps us goin' in the face of bandersnatches and dragons.
